indications.text: adapalene benzoyl peroxide topical gel indicated topical treatment acne vulgaris adults pediatric patients 12 years age older .

contraindications.text: topical . adapalene benzoyl peroxide topical gel oral , ophthalmic , intravaginal . apply thin layer adapalene benzoyl peroxide topical gel affected areas face and/or trunk daily washing . pea-sized amount area face ( e.g . , forehead , chin , cheek ) . wash hands application adapalene benzoyl peroxide topical gel may bleach hair colored fabrics . avoid eyes , lips mucous membranes .

ingredients.name: ACRYLIC ACID/SODIUM ACRYLATE COPOLYMER (1:1; 600 MPA.S AT 0.2%)

name: ADAPALENE AND BENZOYL PEROXIDE
indications_original: Adapalene and benzoyl peroxide topical gel is indicated for the topical treatment of acne vulgaris in adults and pediatric patients 12 years of age and older.
contraindications_original:
For topical use only. Adapalene and benzoyl peroxide topical gel is not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
                     Apply a thin layer of adapalene and benzoyl peroxide topical gel to affected areas of the face and/or trunk once daily after washing.
                     Use a pea-sized amount for each area of the face (e.g., forehead, chin, each cheek).
                     Wash hands after application as adapalene and benzoyl peroxide topical gel may bleach hair or colored fabrics.
                     Avoid the eyes, lips and mucous membranes.
adverseReactions_original: Adapalene and benzoyl peroxide topical gel is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity reactions to benzoyl peroxide or any components of the formulation in adapalene and benzoyl peroxide topical gel.
